name: Legion of defence
description:
THE mother of tower defence - Legion of defence!
Protect home base at all costs from intruders that is lurking in the shadows of the forest.
They will keep on coming in greater forced on every level and you need to stand tall and protect the base!

Super addictive gameplay and great action to play!
Lock and load and fire away!

Unlock different world all across the land and defeat it all.
Now its up to you, will they win or will you stand up tall and defeat all evil?
